recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.instructions: Make sauce. Cook noodles. Brown some ground meat. Then layer sauce, noodles, meat, cheese. Repeat layering once more time. Cook on 425 for 45 minutes.

recipes.title: Burgers
recipes.instructions: Preheat grill to 400 degress. Make 6 ground meat patties that are 1 inch thick. Grill meat for 2 minutes on each side.

recipes.title: Mac & Cheese
recipes.instructions: Boil water. Add macaroni. Cook for 6 minutes. Add cheese and milk. Mix.

recipes.title: Orzo Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook orzo. Dice tomatoes, cucumbers, and olives. Mince garlic, oregano, basic, and parsley. Mix herbs, pasta, and feta cheese in a bowl. Add dressing. Let cool for 3 hours.
